name: Shine On (justbros)
description:
Shine On is an unfinished (in-progress) project for the Metroidvania Month 19 Game Jam.

The assets were made in house by five siblings working on their first video game!

We really hope you enjoy trying our game and welcome any feedback you'd like to leave.

Things that are missing: Enemies, boss, upgrades, sound effects, etc.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow Keys or WASD

Jump: Space Bar

Dash: Shift

Big thanks to Dawnosaur for their player movement resources! Check it out! This game uses a modified version of their movement and dash script.
